java/liquibase/change/DropAllForeignKeyConstraintsChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00007 import liquibase.database.template.JdbcTemplate;
00008 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00011 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.*;
00016 
00017 public class DropAllForeignKeyConstraintsChange extends AbstractChange {
00018 
00019     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00020     private String baseTableName;
00021 
00022     private List<DropForeignKeyConstraintChange> childDropChanges;
00023 
00024 
00025     public DropAllForeignKeyConstraintsChange() {
00026         super("dropAllForeignKeyConstraints", "Drop All Foreign Key Constraints");
00027     }
00028 
00029     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00030         return baseTableSchemaName;
00031     }
00032 
00033     public void setBaseTableSchemaName(String baseTableSchemaName) {
00034         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00035     }
00036 
00037     public String getBaseTableName() {
00038         return baseTableName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public void setBaseTableName(String baseTableName) {
00042         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00046         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(baseTableName) == null) {
00047             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("baseTableName is required", this);
00048         }
00049     }
00050 
00051     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00052         List<SqlStatement> sqlStatements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00053 
00054         if (childDropChanges == null) {
00055             generateChildren(database);
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (childDropChanges != null) {
00059             for (DropForeignKeyConstraintChange change : childDropChanges) {
00060                 sqlStatements.addAll(Arrays.asList(change.generateStatements(database)));
00061             }
00062         }
00063 
00064         return sqlStatements.toArray(new SqlStatement[sqlStatements.size()]);
00065     }
00066 
00067     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00068         return "Foreign keys on base table " + getBaseTableName() + " dropped";
00069     }
00070 
00071     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00072         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00073 
00074         if (getBaseTableSchemaName() != null) {
00075             node.setAttribute("baseTableSchemaName", getBaseTableSchemaName());
00076         }
00077 
00078         node.setAttribute("baseTableName", getBaseTableName());
00079 
00080         return node;
00081     }
00082 
00083     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00084         Set<DatabaseObject> databaseObjects = null;
00085 
00086         if (childDropChanges != null) {
00087             databaseObjects = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00088             for (DropForeignKeyConstraintChange change : childDropChanges) {
00089                 databaseObjects.addAll(change.getAffectedDatabaseObjects());
00090             }
00091         }
00092 
00093         return databaseObjects;
00094     }
00095 
00096     private void generateChildren(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00097         // Make a new list
00098         childDropChanges = new ArrayList<DropForeignKeyConstraintChange>();
00099 
00100         JdbcTemplate jdbc = database.getJdbcTemplate();
00101 
00102         FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement sql = new FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement(
00103                 getBaseTableSchemaName(),
00104                 getBaseTableName()
00105         );
00106 
00107         try {
00108             List<Map> results = jdbc.queryForList(sql);
00109 
00110             if (results != null && results.size() > 0) {
00111                 for (Map result : results) {
00112                     String baseTableName =
00113                             (String) result.get(FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement.RESULT_COLUMN_BASE_TABLE_NAME);
00114                     String constraintName =
00115                             (String) result.get(FindForeignKeyConstraintsStatement.RESULT_COLUMN_CONSTRAINT_NAME);
00116                     if (getBaseTableName().equals(baseTableName)) {
00117                         DropForeignKeyConstraintChange dropForeignKeyConstraintChange =
00118                                 new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00119 
00120                         dropForeignKeyConstraintChange.setBaseTableSchemaName(getBaseTableSchemaName());
00121                         dropForeignKeyConstraintChange.setBaseTableName(baseTableName);
00122                         dropForeignKeyConstraintChange.setConstraintName(constraintName);
00123 
00124                         childDropChanges.add(dropForeignKeyConstraintChange);
00125                     } else {
00126                         throw new IllegalStateException("Expected to return only foreign keys for base table name: " +
00127                                 getBaseTableName() + " and got results for table: " + baseTableName);
00128                     }
00129                 }
00130             }
00131         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00132             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Failed to find foreign keys for table: " + getBaseTableName(), e);
00133         }
00134     }
00135 }
